price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫، ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߣߊ߬ߣߴߌ ߡߊ߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߞߎߛߎ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
